channel.title: Global Objects spawning all over the place randomly - HELP!
channel.description: Okay i have a very professional server except for one thing; Ive put the newobjects() void in case 121 as im supposed to and nowhere else, but if i run half way out into the wild there are objects ive spawned at my server home! Please help me if u have the same problem / know why its happening.

item.title: Global Objects spawning all over the place randomly - HELP!

item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

ok but ive put a lot of work into this source and there must be a quick fix?

Read full topic

item.title: Global Objects spawning all over the place randomly - HELP!

item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

yeah im sure its right and when i look at the coords of the “random” object, its different than the one i spawned :S i could just use delobj(randomx, randomy); i think, but that would lead to alot of lagg

Ivehad this issue with richscape and a new source my friend made from scratch.

item.description:

trying check the coords… also make sure its like this:

makeGlobalObject(absx, absy, id, -2, 10);// description.
